title: Feature Request - Attaching a pinned image on Samsung Tab S10
creator: tuncergonenc
content:
Hi everyone, I use Galaxy Tab S10 Ultra. It is very common for me that I take a screenshot by using smart select function, pin the image and then attach it to the email by dropping the image to the "body" section of the email in Gmail . Is there away to do that on Thunderbird as well?

If not, it would be great to see that feature in Thunderbird with future updates.
